summary: The Other Side of Sunday criticizes the small, and often tight church community. We follow the Preachers Daughter; Maria, in her journey to liberate herself from the stiff church community and her strict religious father.
cast: Marie Theisen|Hildegun Riise|Bjørn Sundquist|Sylvia Salvesen|Martin Dahl Garfalk|Ina Sofie Brodahl|Ann Kristin Rasmussen|Jørgen Langhelle|Hallvard Holmen|Kai Kennet Hanson|Petter Width Kristiansen|Henriette Engesæth|Kristian Aaby
keywords: reference to jesus christ|church|sunday|norway|strong female protagonist
title: Søndagsengler
